snippet.title: NEON WHITE | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Neon White is a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. Coming soon to Nintendo Switch and PC. Add to your Steam wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1533420/Neon_White/

You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though…did you know them in a past life? 

https://neonwhite.rip/

Developed by BEN ESPOSITO. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2021
